titleStmt.title: Articles collected out of the rubrick of the Book of common-prayer, and other ecclesiastical laws now in force. For the help and assistance of the church-wardens and side-men (with the assistance of their ministers) of every parish within the Arch-Deaconry of Norwich in the visitation of the Reverend John Reynolds M.A. Arch-Deacon of the Arch-Deaconry of Norwich. In the year of our Lord God 1677. Owen Hughes Dr. of Laws, official.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Norwich. Archdeacon (1668-1676 : Raynolds)

titleStmt.title: Articles collected out of the rubrick of the Book of common-prayer, and other ecclesiastical laws now in force. For the help and assistance of the church-wardens and side-men (with the assistance of their ministers) of every parish within the Arch-Deaconry of Norwich in the visitation of the Reverend John Reynolds M.A. Arch-Deacon of the Arch-Deaconry of Norwich. titleStmt.author: Church of England. Archdeaconry of Norwich. Archdeacon (1668-1676 : Raynolds)
Raynolds, John, 1628 or 9-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
